name: E. The Holmes Children
statement:
The Holmes children are fighting over who amongst them is the
cleverest.Mycroft asked Sherlock and Eurus to find value of , where and
for , is the number of distinct ordered positive integer pairs that
satisfy and . The integer is the greatest common divisor of and
.Sherlock said that solving this was child’s play and asked Mycroft to
instead get the value of . Summation is done over all positive integers
that divide .Eurus was quietly observing all this and finally came up
with her problem to astonish both Sherlock and Mycroft.She defined a
-composite function recursively as follows:She wants them to tell the
value of modulo .
editorial:
